title: The firefighting appliances shall be distributed over the building in accordance with IS: 2190-1971 Code of Practice for Selection, Installation and Maintenance of Portable First-Aid Fire Appliances
clause_text: The firefighting appliances shall be distributed over the building in accordance with IS: 2190-1971 Code of Practice for Selection, Installation and Maintenance of Portable First-Aid Fire Appliances.
section: Provision of First Aid and Fire-fighting Appliances
